wikipedia_page.main:
John George Johnson (1829–1896) was an English Conservative Party politician.
He was elected Conservative MP for Exeter in 1874 but was defeated at the next election in 1880.During 1872, he was also High Sheriff of Devon. He married Frances Grace Brinckman, daughter of Sir Theodore Brinckman, 1st Baronet.

Johnson was the son of John Johnson of St Osyth's Priory, Essex, and his wife Ann Haward, daughter of William Haward of Battersea. He was educated at King's College London and became a merchant in London. He was J.P. for Devon.Debretts House of Commons and the Judicial Bench 1881
